name: Roll for Damage (ReesesPiecesIV)
description:
Fight through hell with your magic dice.

Collect the souls of the damned to increase your power.

Upgrades from the shop are applied to random dice in your arsenal.

Don't forget to pick up your dice after throwing, otherwise they will take time to come back.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Point to Aim

Left Click to Throw

E for Shop
